SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.network.messages.gameMessages

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.network.messages.gameMessages.GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameView extends Object implements Serializable
This class is the immutable version of the Game class, which allows the distributed MVC paradigm to work. In particular this class provides to the View all the information it needs to show the users the game state.
See Also:
